mapper.select: select av.id id, av.NAME name, av.attr_key_id attrKeyId, ak.NAME attrKeyName from attr_value av LEFT JOIN attr_key ak ON ak.id = av.attr_key_id where av.is_deleted = 0 and ak.is_deleted = 0 and av.id in (select attr_value_id from room_attr_value where is_deleted = 0 and room_id = #{id})
